trans-unit.source: Allows activity designer developers to add custom designer verb providers to an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Permite aos programadores estruturador adicionar fornecedores do estruturador de verbo personalizado para um designer de atividade de atividade.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Classes that implement this interface can add and remove custom verb providers--any classes that implement the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider> interface -- to and from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]As classes que implemente esta interface podem adicionar e remover fornecedores de verbo personalizado – quaisquer classes que implementam o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider>interface – e para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>classes.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider>

trans-unit.source: Adds a class that implements the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider"></xref> interface to the list of verb providers that an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma classe que implementa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider"> </xref> interface à lista de fornecedores de verbo que um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> utiliza.

trans-unit.source: Removes a class that implements the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider"></xref> interface to the list of verb providers that an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: Remove uma classe que implementa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider"> </xref> interface à lista de fornecedores de verbo que um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> utiliza.
Obtém um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider"> </xref> coleção só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: VerbProviders returns an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider> collection that contains all verb providers associated with a specific <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: VerbProviders devolve uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider>coleção que contém todos os fornecedores de verbo associados <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> específico</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerVerbProvider>
